meta_info.name: HISTORY
meta_info.description: Root object of a linear history, i.e. time series structure. This is a generic class whose type parameter must be a descendant of `ITEM_STRUCTURE`, ensuring that each Event in the `_events_` of a given instance is of the same structural type, i.e. `ITEM_TREE`, `ITEM_LIST` etc.

attributes.name: origin
attributes.description: Time origin of this event history. The first event is not necessarily at the origin point.

attributes.name: period
attributes.description: Period between samples in this segment if periodic.

attributes.name: duration
attributes.description: Duration of the entire History; either corresponds to the duration of all the events, and/or the duration represented by the summary, if it exists.

attributes.name: summary
attributes.description: Optional summary data that aggregates, organizes, reduces and transforms the event series. This may be a text or image that presents a graphical presentation, or some data that assists with the interpretation of the data.

attributes.name: events
attributes.description: The events in the series. This attribute is of a generic type whose parameter must be a descendant of `ITEM_SUTRUCTURE`.
